name: Fire In The Student House
description:
Fire In The Student House is a short action 2D game.

A fire causes panic and chaos in the student residence. While everyone runs away in terror, you will have to resolve the situation.

Controls

Move: WASD or ARROW keys.

Use the fire extinguisher: SPACE.

Credits

Develop: Ivan Moraleja

Graphics: RPGMaker resources

Sound: freesound.org

Text Font: pizzadude.dk

You can play in browser or download the game.
